title: Change color theme and dashboard view to stylish design

requirements.text: Update the color theme across the entire application to a stylish, modern palette. Replace the current warm neutral/sage green color scheme with a fresh, contemporary design that avoids blue and purple unless specifically requested. The new theme should use sophisticated color combinations that work well in both light and dark modes, maintaining proper contrast ratios for accessibility.

quotes: change colour theme and dashboard view to stylish

acceptanceCriteria: All pages and components use the new color theme consistently
Color theme works in both light and dark modes
Text and interactive elements maintain WCAG AA contrast standards
CSS variables in index.css are updated with the new color palette

requirements.text: Redesign the dashboard layout (DashboardPage.tsx) with a stylish, modern visual presentation. Improve the visual hierarchy of summary metrics cards (tasks, clients, revenue) and the aggregated data sections. Use contemporary card designs, improved spacing, modern typography, and visual elements that match the new color theme. The layout should feel polished and professional while maintaining all existing functionality.

quotes: change colour theme and dashboard view to stylish

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard has a visually distinct, modern layout
Summary metrics are displayed in stylish cards with improved visual hierarchy
Task aggregations by category, subcategory, and status are presented with enhanced visual design
All existing dashboard functionality (navigation to detail views, data display) is preserved
Layout is responsive and works on mobile and desktop devices

requirements.text: Update the application layout components (AppLayout.tsx, navigation sidebar) to align with the new stylish theme. Modernize the header, sidebar navigation, and mobile sheet navigation with contemporary design patterns that complement the new color scheme and dashboard redesign.

quotes: change colour theme and dashboard view to stylish

acceptanceCriteria: Header and navigation components use the new color theme
Navigation has a modern, polished appearance
User profile dropdown and logout functionality remain intact
Mobile navigation sheet maintains usability with updated styling

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files in frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain all existing functionality - this is a visual redesign only
Preserve all CRUD operations, bulk upload/edit, filtering, sorting, and pagination features
Do not change the Motoko backend (backend/main.mo)
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond visual redesign
Changing the technology stack (React, Tailwind, Shadcn)
Modifying backend logic or data models
Adding third-party UI libraries beyond existing dependencies
